reason: Specific question about 인사위원회 구성. Answer accurately covers 위원 수(7~9인), 위원장(부교육감), 외부인사 1/2 이상, 학부모 1인 이상, 임기 2년 연임 1회 - all verified against page 97 lines 11-15.
Specific question about 의결정족수. Answer correctly states 재적위원 3분의 2 이상 출석으로 개의, 출석위원 과반수 찬성으로 의결. Verified against page 97 line 25. Example calculation is helpful and accurate.
Specific question about 심의사항. Answer lists all 9 items accurately: items 1-5 from page 97, items 6-9 from page 98. Well-structured and factually correct.
Bad question - asks about '제한사항' (restrictions) regarding 심의사항, but source has no such restrictions. Answer is a raw dump of the 심의사항 list that does not address restrictions at all.
Nonsensical question - '산정 기준' (calculation criteria) is inapplicable to 심의사항 which is a deliberation item list. Answer is duplicate of q_1_1286, just dumping the same 심의사항 list.
Question asks for 판례/사례 (court precedents/cases) which do not exist in the source material. Answer ignores the question and dumps the same 심의사항 list without any cases.
Vague question asking about '세부 기준' (detailed criteria) which is meaningless for a deliberation item list. Answer is a duplicate raw dump of the same 심의사항 content as q_1_1286/1288/1289.
Comprehensive question requesting all 인사위원회 운영 regulations. Answer is well-organized covering 설치, 조직, 회의소집, 의결정족수 with correct law citations (제27-30조). All content verified against page 97.
Confusing question combining '회의소집' and '심의사항' incoherently. Answer is a raw dump of the entire 인사위원회 운영 section, duplicating q_1_1296 without specifically addressing the question.
Duplicate of q_1_1296 - nearly identical answer content (entire 인사위원회 운영 section dump). Question is also very similar to q_1_1296.
